task.title: Allowing Other Users in Your Organization to Create Ideas
task.shortdesc: You can create a bookmark to the dialog box where a user can enter an idea, and share it with other people who might contribute ideas.

context.p: When somebody creates an idea using this bookmark, you can drop it into the desired place in the queue. You can also edit or delete ideas submitted by other people.

To use the bookmark, the user must log in. You can either create a user login for each person you invite to create ideas, or use a generic login. The advantage to creating a separate login for each user is that the person who created the idea is identified.
